version_description:
Fixes issue with previous binary that was missing some pieces -stopping the app from running.

New in 6.1:
Full-text search on Example Sentences.
Improved spell-checker.
Improved search mode button.
Linking out to external titles from the search field.
New "Study Memo" feature with iCloud syncing.


â€» hint:
1. Swipe or hold down the "Search mode button" for a menu.
2. Use the "Study Memo" to hold lesson notes or other things to remember.

New localizations.
Auto play of example sentences.
Better import.
Better flashcards.

New design for iOS7 and iOS8
Improved iOS8 support

Pre-existing LDOCE5 Bookmarks now display and function as LDOCE6 Favorites.
Phonetics present near the head word

COMING SOON: Offline media access

Pre-existing LDOCE5 Bookmarks now display and function as LDOCE6 Favorites.
Phonetics present near the head word

COMING SOON: Offline media access

New and improved Bookmark features
1) All your bookmarked words are available in the "Bookmark Menu".
2) Several new functions available to organize and manage your bookmarked words efficiently

Audio content now available offline
1) Now all the UK and US pronunciation for dictionary words are available offline.
2) Tap on the audio play icons to listen to the pronunciation

New and Improved Bookmark features

* New filters available to organize and manage your bookmarked words efficiently
* Various Bug fixes and stability improvements

* Search added to the Main navigation menu
* Academic word List added to the Main navigation menu
* Various bug fixes and stability improvements

* Improved Search results capabilities
* Various Bug fixes and stability improvements

Coming soon
* Phrasal Verb search
